title: How to Get an Eevee with Wish

steps.headline: Get a male Togetic that knows Wish, a female Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty and a female Eevee.
steps.description: Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty and Eevee have to be female because the female Pokémon determines which species will hatch from the egg. Togetic learns Wish at level 29. Togepi evolves into Togetic through friendship; see Evolve Pokémon for information on how to evolve Pokémon through that method.

steps.headline: Breed the male Togetic with the female Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty.
steps.description: The resulting egg will hatch into a Pichu or Skitty that knows Wish. You'll want to hatch a male one, so that you can breed it with the female Eevee. If you're using Pikachu, you'll have to evolve the Pichu into Pikachu first, which evolves by friendship.

steps.headline: Breed the male Pikachu or Skitty that knows Wish with the female Eevee.
steps.description: The resulting egg will hatch into an Eevee that knows Wish.

text: Get a male Togetic that knows Wish, a female Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty and a female Eevee. Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty and Eevee have to be female because the female Pokémon determines which species will hatch from the egg. Togetic learns Wish at level 29. Togepi evolves into Togetic through friendship; see Evolve Pokémon for information on how to evolve Pokémon through that method. Breed the male Togetic with the female Pikachu, Raichu, Skitty, or Delcatty. The resulting egg will hatch into a Pichu or Skitty that knows Wish. You'll want to hatch a male one, so that you can breed it with the female Eevee. If you're using Pikachu, you'll have to evolve the Pichu into Pikachu first, which evolves by friendship. Breed the male Pikachu or Skitty that knows Wish with the female Eevee. The resulting egg will hatch into an Eevee that knows Wish.
